trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Varthon is in a hurry, but not in such a hurry that he would deny a helping hand.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_TODO_00<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “tuktu” to assure Karnes you are not an enemy.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_TODO_01<tab>Search the designated location for Slitherbough serum.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the Slitherbough serum to Karnes.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_001<tab>You! You're that guest Master Matoya was telling us about. Please, you have to help me!
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_002<tab>I've searched high and low, but I can't find my friend Karnes anywhere. I fear he's run off to Fort Gohn again.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_003<tab>It's where we grew up, but it was abandoned years ago after the sin eaters attacked.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_004<tab>The place is teeming with all manner of beasts now, and Master Matoya has expressly forbidden anyone from setting foot there.

TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_005<tab>I don't know what's gotten into him lately, but we have to find him, before he gets hurt. If you should find him first, you'll want to tell him our password─tuktu. He's the skittish sort, so don't delay in telling him so he'll know you mean no harm.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_010<tab>S-Stay away! I beg of you!

TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “tuktu” and allay Karnes's fears.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_SYSTEM_100_011<tab>tuktu
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_011<tab>You... You're from Slitherbough? Varthon must have sent you, then.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_012<tab>I was fine until that damned beetle. It's only a scratch, but I'm starting to feel numb, and my vision's grown clouded.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_013<tab>Worst of all, I dropped my only vial of serum somewhere in these damned woods. Could you find it for me?
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_015<tab>The vial should be somewhere close by.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_030<tab>So you came back after all.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_031<tab>There you are. Did you find it?
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_032<tab>Thank you. I should be fine now after a bit of rest.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_033<tab>What were you thinking coming back here? You could've been killed!
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_034<tab>I had to, Varthon. For my father...
